first_name: "comment" : "INR reference range applies to patients on anticoagulant therapy.   Suggested INR therapeutic ranges for oral anticoagulant therapy: Routine Therapy:                               2.0 - 3.0 Recurrent Myocardial Infarction or Mechanical Prosthetic Valves:                  2.5 - 3.5 For patients not on OAT
last_name: use the prothrombin time reference range in seconds. (Ref: Hirsh J. Chest
